items.sentence: Those who were banished from the country were required to forever abjure their right to return.
The aisle was packed with an enormous variety of brassieres, in all shapes, sizes, and designs.
Mary likes to wear clothes with vertical stripes, because she heard they make you look thinner.
Even if you aren't hungry, you should eat something. Otherwise you won't last until lunch time.
What is considered impolite in one language may not be considered impolite in another language.
